text: ai rasool munaapheqeen aur vah log jinake dilon mein (kufr ka) marz hai aur jo log madeene mein buree khabaren udaaya karate hain- agar ye log (apanee sharaaraton se) baaz na aaengen to ham tum hee ko (ek na ek din) un par musallat kar degen phir vah tumhaare pados mein chand rozon ke siva thaharane (hee) na paenge
